title: Guides: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM): Resources
author: Emily Gorman
description: Guides: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM): Resources
cleaned_text: 601 West Lombard Street Baltimore MD 21201-1512 Reference: 410-706-7996 Circulation: 410-706-7928 The field of complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) encompasses a wide range of holistic therapies and healing practices. Until recently, many of these treatments were not taught in most medical schools, used in hospitals, or reimbursed by medical insurance. Increasingly, as these therapies become more widespread, practitioners need both professional and patient-oriented information regarding their use and effectiveness. For a complete list of journals of CAM, please look up the [journal list](http://survey.hshsl.umaryland.edu/?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&db=edspub&bquery=(Complementary+AND+Alternative+AND+Medicine)&type=44&site=eds-live). Click the titles to locate the books in the catalog. For more books, search " [Alternative medicine](http://catalog.umd.edu/F/L4MRN5UAEDXR6AG3N3PN3CBJTAFLL3NYN2M398H1VQT3ENXRN3-05493?func=scan&scan_code=SUB&scan_start=Alternative+medicine)" or " [Complementary Therapies](http://catalog.umd.edu/F/L4MRN5UAEDXR6AG3N3PN3CBJTAFLL3NYN2M398H1VQT3ENXRN3-05874?func=scan&scan_code=SUB&scan_start=Complementary+Therapies)" by Subject in the library catalog.
